## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G40690](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G40690)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>GLY1, SFD1</u>
- **Gene Name:** SUPPRESSOR OF FATTY ACID DESATURASE DEFICIENCY 1
- **Description:**   NAD-dependent glycerol-3-phosphate dehydrogenase family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
